name: Glanduff
description:
Glanduff is a tiny puzzle/adventure game in a magical island world.

Team

  • GENTILHOMME "Fraxken" Thomas : UI Designer, Modeler, level-artist, level-designer
  • MALAJ "Shqiptar" Alexandre : Lead developers, modeler
  • MONTES "CaptainFive" Irvin : Composer, sound-designer
  • Demogia : Lead artist, modeler

Game music is created by irvin montes : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMECpPkb5kte5RZYK...

Website of the team : http://antarka.com/
